name: Just Keep Running
description:
Just Keep Running is a free-running game based on the theme direction made for Joshua Mclean's 1st Speedrun Jam. I interpreted the theme as directional momentum, and turned it into a free-running game.

There's only one level but it shows off the climbing mechanic and how it can be used for multiple different purposes. I would have implemented more mechanics but ran out of time, the same with the short level design. There may be some underlying bugs which i didnt find but nothing should break game that much.

My record for beating it is about 56 seconds so good luck with speedruns.

Controls:
Space - Jump (Duh)
WASD - Move
Shift - Sprint
E - Climb walls (Doesn't work for everything)
I - Swap to Inverted Camera
Escape - Return to Main Menu

Please feel free to be critical in the comments
